help.title: Reminder module help
help.text:
Set repeatable automated reminder alerts tied to your channel.
Remove an alert with: `%PREFIX%%COMMAND% remove <alertName>`
Test an alert with: `%PREFIX%%COMMAND% test <alertName>`

To get a personal notifiaction on an alert, you can register for a mention with:
`%PREFIX%%COMMAND% me [on|off] <alertName|all>`

**Note:** *When adding an alert, use backticks around your values like shown in the example below.*

queries.getReminderByName: SELECT * FROM reminder WHERE channelID = ? AND name = ?
queries.deleteReminder: DELETE FROM reminder WHERE channelID = ? and name = ?
queries.setReminder: INSERT INTO reminder (channelID, name, dateTime, cadence, text, active, mentions) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE dateTime = ?, cadence = ?, text = ?
queries.addMention: UPDATE reminder SET mentions = CONCAT( mentions, ? ) WHERE channelID = ? AND name LIKE ?
queries.addMentionToAll: UPDATE reminder SET mentions = CONCAT( mentions, ? ) WHERE channelID = ?
queries.removeMention: UPDATE reminder SET mentions = REPLACE(mentions, ?, '') WHERE channelID = ? AND name LIKE ?
queries.removeAllMentions: UPDATE reminder SET mentions = REPLACE(mentions, ?, '') WHERE channelID = ?
